Hey all,

I recently found a text adventure called Micropuzzle, it comes from a book called Weird Computer Games written by Jenny Tyler and Chris Oxlade, published by Usborne.Here's the link the to the pdf (Micropuzzle is page 12):
[url:wsn1pjjp]ftp://ftp.worldofspectrum.org/pub/sinclair/books/WeirdComputerGames.pdf[/url:wsn1pjjp]
And i've been really struggling to beat this game! If anyone is interested , could they please give it a try and make a walkthrough? Time is of the essence!

Here's a dropbox link to the files (which contains a c64 emulator to run the game if you dont have one already, and the tape image for the game) [url:wsn1pjjp]https://www.dropbox.com/sh/u8iisyax7h8rtow/v8iPt69WdP[/url:wsn1pjjp]

Oh and if you want to know what commands you have and items there are to interact with, go to page 16 of the pdf and look at lines 1800-1870!


What i've got so far:

Initial map layout i made:

[url:wsn1pjjp]http://imgur.com/4RByXuG[/url:wsn1pjjp]

You can tie the thread to the tree. That's as far as i've got!
Best of luck, and post-haste, i'll be checking this thread frequently!
